letter.title: A Personal Letter From Steve Martin
letter.paragraph: What a pleasure it was to recieve a letter from you. Although my schedule is very busy, I decided to take time out to write you a personal reply.

Too often performers lose contact with their audience and begin to take them for granted, but I don't think that will ever happen to me, will it Jenny? I don't know when I'll be appeading close to you, but keep that extra bunk made up in case I get to Flint.
letter.postscript: I'll always cherish that afternoon we spent together in Rio, walking along the beach, looking at rocks.
